content.raw: Hmm, it seems the culprit is somewhere else. I was able to reproduce the exact error from Jenkins, and in my case, it got solved by adding include directory `-IC:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10\include\10.0.16299.0\ucrt` manually to the build command. Now the question is how to find this directory using cmake. I'll keep investigating.

Now the question is how to find this directory using cmake. I'll keep investigating.
